org.apache.flink.runtime.minicluster

类 MiniClusterJobDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.minicluster.MiniClusterJobDispatcher

  • public class MiniClusterJobDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    The dispatcher that runs in the mini cluster, waits for jobs, and starts job masters upon receiving jobs.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      private static class  MiniClusterJobDispatcher.BlockingJobSync
      This class is used to sync on blocking jobs across multiple runners.
      private class  MiniClusterJobDispatcher.DetachedFinalizer
      Simple class that waits for all runners to have reported that they are done.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private Configuration configuration
      the configuration with which the mini cluster was started
      private HighAvailabilityServices haServices
      services for discovery, leader election, and recovery
      private HeartbeatServices heartbeatServices
      services for heartbeating
      private JobManagerServices jobManagerServices
      all the services that the JobManager needs, such as BLOB service, factories, etc
      private java.lang.Object lock
      lock to ensure that this dispatcher executes only one job at a time
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private MetricRegistry metricRegistry
      Registry for all metrics in the mini cluster
      private int numJobManagers
      The number of JobManagers to launch (more than one simulates a high-availability setup)
      private RpcService[] rpcServices
      the RPC services to use by the job managers
      private JobManagerRunner[] runners
      The runner for the job and master. non-null if a job is currently running
      private boolean shutdown
      flag marking the dispatcher as hut down

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MiniClusterJobDispatcher

        public MiniClusterJobDispatcher(Configuration config,
                                RpcService rpcService,
                                HighAvailabilityServices haServices,
                                BlobServer blobServer,
                                HeartbeatServices heartbeatServices,
                                MetricRegistry metricRegistry)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Starts a mini cluster job dispatcher.

        The dispatcher kicks off one JobManager per job, a behavior similar to a non-highly-available setup.

        参数:
        config - The configuration of the mini cluster
        haServices - Access to the discovery, leader election, and recovery services
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the services for the JobMaster could not be started.

      • MiniClusterJobDispatcher

        public MiniClusterJobDispatcher(Configuration config,
                                HighAvailabilityServices haServices,
                                BlobServer blobServer,
                                HeartbeatServices heartbeatServices,
                                MetricRegistry metricRegistry,
                                int numJobManagers,
                                RpcService[] rpcServices)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Starts a mini cluster job dispatcher.

        The dispatcher may kick off more than one JobManager per job, thus simulating a highly-available setup.

        参数:
        config - The configuration of the mini cluster
        haServices - Access to the discovery, leader election, and recovery services
        numJobManagers - The number of JobMasters to start for each job.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the services for the JobMaster could not be started.

    • 方法详细资料

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Shuts down the mini cluster dispatcher. If a job is currently running, that job will be terminally failed.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • runDetached

        public void runDetached(JobGraph job)
                 throws JobExecutionException
        This method executes a job in detached mode. The method returns immediately after the job has been added to the
        参数:
        job - The Flink job to execute
        抛出:
        JobExecutionException - Thrown if anything went amiss during initial job launch, or if the job terminally failed.

      • runJobBlocking

        public JobExecutionResult runJobBlocking(JobGraph job)
                                  throws JobExecutionException,
                                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method runs a job in blocking mode. The method returns only after the job completed successfully, or after it failed terminally.
        参数:
        job - The Flink job to execute
        返回:
        The result of the job execution
        抛出:
        JobExecutionException - Thrown if anything went amiss during initial job launch, or if the job terminally failed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • startJobRunners

        private JobManagerRunner[] startJobRunners(JobGraph job,
                                           OnCompletionActions onCompletion,
                                           FatalErrorHandler errorHandler)
                                    throws JobExecutionException
        抛出:
        JobExecutionException

      • clearJobRunningState

        private void clearJobRunningState(JobID jobID)
